title: A breathing after God. Or a Christians desire of Gods presence. By the late reverent and worthy divine Richard Sibs, Doctor in Divinity, master of Katherine Hall in Cambridge, and sometime preacher of Graies-Inne
author: Sibbes, Richard, 1577-1635.
publisher: Printed by Iohn Dawson for R. M[abb] and are to be sold by Thomas Slater, at the Swan in Duck-lane,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
